snippet: There will be something for everyone in 2012, from Jon Gruden in full snarl to Tom Brady in humble mode. With the obligatory Rex Ryan guarantee.
abstract: There will be something for everyone in 2012, from Jon Gruden in full snarl to Tom Brady in humble mode. With the obligatory Rex Ryan guarantee.

headline.main: Inside Dirt on the N.F.L. in 2012: Mayans, and Others, Get It Wrong
